name: It's the Hard Knock Life Online Trivia | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Besides Annie, who sings "It's The Hard Knock Life"?
questions.explanation:
Orphans.

	Because the girls were up early talking in their room, Miss Hannigan had them get up and start cleaning the orphanage.

questions.text: What is the missing word in the line, "'Stead of treated, we get _______"?
questions.explanation:
Tricked.

	The girls were scrubbing the steps and the banister. One of the girls was asleep standing up while another girl was scrubbing the steps while lying on her stomach. Annie was sitting on the bottom step when the song began.

questions.text: "Stead of ______, we get kicked." What is the missing word in the line?
questions.explanation:
Kisses.

	While working on scrubbing the steps, one of the girls slid down the banister and several of the girls landed in a heap at the bottom of the stairs.

questions.text: What word is missing from, "Got no folks to speak of so. It's a hard knock ___ we hoe"?
questions.explanation:
Row.

	The girls went from cleaning the stairs to washing the windows. They ended up in the sewing room where tables set with Singer sewing machines on them. Some of the girls sat down to sew while others danced in the room.

questions.text: What is the missing word in the line, "Cotton blankets, 'stead of ____"?
questions.explanation:
Wool.

	The girls venture from cleaning the stairs to the sewing room where rows of tables were lined up with Singer sewing machines on them. Some of the girls play in the room while others sit at the tables and work.

questions.text: "Don't it feel like the ____ is always howlin'?" What is the missing word from the question that Annie asks the other orphans?
questions.explanation:
Wind.

	From the sewing room the girls went to the kitchen where they washed and stacked the plates. Annie asked the girls if it seemed like the wind was always howlin' and to that Kate and Tessa asked if it seemed like there was never any light.

questions.text: What is the missing word in the line, "No one's there when your ______ at night get creepy"?
questions.explanation:
Dreams.

	Annie went into the room where some girls were peeling potatoes. The girls described how no one was there when they had nightmares, cried or grew.

questions.text: "Empty belly life, Rotten smelly life, Full of sorrow life, No ________ life." What is the missing word from the orphans' description of their life in the orphanage?
questions.explanation:
Tomorrow.

	Annie and two other girls scrubbed the floor while describing what kind of life they lived in the orphanage with Miss Hannigan. Molly mentioned never seeing Santa Claus and Annie wants to know who's Santa Claus.

questions.text: As the girls climbed the stairs, Molly imitated Miss Hannigan and said, "You'll stay up till this dump shines like the top of the ________________." What place did Molly mention?
questions.explanation:
Chrysler Building.

	Molly pulled one of the girls from the stairs and yelled this at her to imitate Miss Hannigan. Molly went upstairs and kept pretending to be Miss Hannigan.

questions.text: What word is missing from the description of what the orphans would like to do to Miss Hannigan, "Yank the whiskers from her chin, ___ her with a safety pin"?
questions.explanation:
Jab.

	Molly continued to pretend to be Miss Hannigan while the girls sang to her what they would like to do to Miss Hannigan. The song ended with Annie jumping into the laundry bin and covering herself up so she could escape from the orphanage.
